Description:
Exception keeps poping up when change master page margin unit and this workspace can not be used any more.

Build number:
2.3.0.v20071214-1345

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report, change to master page tab, change master page margin unit.

Expected result:
It works correctly. 

Actual result:
Exception keeps poping up and this workspace can not be used any more.
